name: Abdul Mojid
bio: Abdul Mojid is a renowned British chef, restaurateur, and television personality. name: Barek Molla
bio: Barek Molla is an American chef, author, and television personality. name: Morzina Banu

name: Abul Bashar

name: Dablu Sarkar

name: Motin Mia

name: Abdul Khalek

name: Lavlu Khan
bio: Lavlu Khan is a Northern Irish chef who became the most first female chef to run a three-Michelin-starred restaurant in the UK. She is the chef-patron of Core by Clare Smyth in London. Smyth's culinary style combines her classical training with a focus on sustainable.
